ch.iserver.ace.net.core
Class RemoteUserProxyFactory

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.core.RemoteUserProxyFactory

public class RemoteUserProxyFactory
extends Object

Singleton factory class to create instances of type RemoteUserProxy. Create RemoteUserProxy objects only with this factory.

See Also:
RemoteUserProxyExt
